title: I cant post? Im Lvl 17?
body:
Im lvl 17 and you need to be lvl 7 to post in gameplay

Im trying to post a report on a player who intentionally fed in my game and I have recorded it.

replies.body: These boards account need a gentle nudge everyone now and then to get them to sync up with your Summoner level. Looks like posting here did the trick!
